Description.Text: Theros Hotel is a friendly 3-star property offering comfortable studio and apartment accommodation in northwest Crete. Highlights include a pool bar, an outdoor swimming pool and a good location just off the beach. Tavronitis is a small village located on Crete's north-western coast. It offers a charming beach and easy access to gorgeous landmarks and landscapes. Regional places of interest include the picturesque Chania town with its old town and Venetian harbour, the Firka Fortress and the neighbourhood of Splantia. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Crete destinations. The hotel occupies a modern low-rise building with a large terrace area. Facilities include a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Studios are spacious and decorated in an elegant style. They feature a private balcony offering sea and pool views. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, radio, safe, work desk, an en-suite bathroom and a well-equipped kitchenette with a fridge and hob. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the pool bar. Every studio and apartment contains all the equipment needed to cook individual meals. Free parking is possible onsite.
